Package bacnet.datamodel.sequence

Class Genome

java.lang.Object
bacnet.datamodel.sequence.Genome
public class Genome extends Object
Class for managing Genome
  • Contains all Genes, non-coding RNA and all other elements found in the genome GFF GFFNCBIReader
    • Author:
    Christophe BÃ©cavin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
      Constructor
      Description
      Genome()
       
      Genome(String genomePath, boolean annotation)
      Create a Genome from .fna, .annot, and all serialized Sequence object:
      Read Genome sequence information in the different fna files
      Load annotation information

      As we are dealing with bacteria, we are sure that the chromosome with maximum length is THE chromosome, other are plasmids.

      loadGenome(String genomeAccession, boolean keepInMemory)
      Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded If not search load it If keepInMemory is true : Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded if not load it
      If keepInMemory is false : Only load the Genome without saving it

      static Genome
      loadGenome(String genomeAccession, String path, boolean keepInMemory, boolean annotation)
      Load/return a genome given by a genomeAccession ID

      If keepInMemory is true : Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded if not load it
      If keepInMemory is false : Only load the Genome without saving it

      If annotation is true : Load annotation information of the genome
      If anotation is false : Only load the sequence of the genome
      static HashMap<String,String>

    • Constructor Details

      • Genome

        public Genome()

      • Genome

        public Genome(String genomePath, boolean annotation) throws Exception
        Create a Genome from .fna, .annot, and all serialized Sequence object:
      • Read Genome sequence information in the different fna files
      • Load annotation information

        As we are dealing with bacteria, we are sure that the chromosome with maximum length is THE chromosome, other are plasmids. So we search this chromosome and classify the other as plasmid by ordering the list.
        • Parameters:
        genomePath -
        annotation -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • loadGenome

        public static Genome loadGenome(String genomeAccession)
        Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded If not search load it
        Returns:

        Exception

      • loadGenome

        public static Genome loadGenome(String genomeAccession, boolean keepInMemory)
        Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded If not search load it If keepInMemory is true : Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded if not load it
        If keepInMemory is false : Only load the Genome without saving it

        Parameters:
        genomeAccession -
        keepInMemory -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        Exception

      • loadGenome

        public static Genome loadGenome(String genomeAccession, String path, boolean keepInMemory, boolean annotation)
        Load/return a genome given by a genomeAccession ID

        If keepInMemory is true : Find in ModelProvider if Genome Accession is already loaded if not load it
        If keepInMemory is false : Only load the Genome without saving it

        If annotation is true : Load annotation information of the genome
        If anotation is false : Only load the sequence of the genome
        Parameters:
        genomeAccession -
        keepInMemory -
        annotation -
        Returns:

      • getChromosomeNames

        public ArrayList<String> getChromosomeNames()
        Get an ordered list of all chromosomes The order is fixed by the order of the chromosomes in the FNA (fasta) file used for reading the genome
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • modifyID

        public static String modifyID(String name, String prefix)
        Modify id of gene, to be sure that the suffix number is always of 4 numbers
        ex: replace lmpc1 by lmpc0001, lmpc12 by lmpc0012
        Parameters:
        name -
        suffix - used for gene name, ex: lmo, lmpc, LMRG_
        Returns:
